2017.tpci.heliolisk.bundle.3: Diving from the edge of space, Mega Rayquaza-EX makes its magnificent debut while Mega Latios-EX and a horde of Dragon types bellow their challenge! With high-flying superstars like Deoxys, Dragonite, Zekrom, Hydreigon-EX, and Thundurus-EX, the Pokémon TCG: XY—Roaring Skies expansion calls you to battle higher, faster, stronger—and with all-new boosts like Mega Turbo and Double Dragon Energy cards, the sky’s the limit! Ascend to the clouds and soar to victory!
2017.tpci.heliolisk.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Heliolisk Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY47) 1 Pokémon TCG: XY—Roaring Skies booster pack (10-card) 1 silver Chespin coin These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through March 14, 2017.

playmat.prompt.sm1_52.strongchargeplacem: Choose a Pokémon to attach the {0} card to.
